duties.text: System created to manage events, sales, suppliers and customers. Developed the backend with PHP7, frontend with ReactJs and Bootstrap. The database is MySql based.
App developed as a game to play with friends. Backend is NodeJs, frontend is React Native. The database is MongoDB.
System developed to manage the previous calls and sales. The backend was developed in PHP7, frontend in CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery. The database is MySql based.
